links.title: In the News
links.content:
##### Bootstrap Modal with Dynamic Content

×

Close

[NVE Home](index.php) > [About](/companyInfo) > In The News

##### In The News (2024)

**November 20, 2024** [Three Undiscovered Gems In The US Market With Strong Potential](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/3-undiscovered-gems-us-market-140308474.html) _Simply Wall St_ “...a nimble player in the semiconductor space.” 

**September 6, 2024** [The Strongest U.S. Semiconductor Companies](https://realrate.ai/the-strongest-u-s-semiconductor-companies-ranked-by-realrates-oustanding-artificial-intelligence/) “NVE climbed one place from last year to take the top spot.” _RealRate_ **July 22, 2024** [Exploring NVE and Two Other Undiscovered Gem Stocks](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/exploring-nve-two-other-undiscovered-150520096.html) _Simply Wall St_ “...NVE ...presents intriguing financial and operational metrics. With a Price-to-Earnings ratio of 23.3x, it sits below the industry average of 28x, indicating potential undervaluation.” 

**July 18, 2024** [NVE Corp (NVEC) Q1 Earnings](https://www.zacks.com/stock/news/2304794/nve-corp-nvec-q1-earnings-fall-yy-on-lower-product-sales) _Zacks Equity Research_ “The slight dip in net income and EPS, combined with continued investment in research and development, reflects a strategic approach to navigating the current market challenges. The consistent dividend payout further underscores the company’s financial resilience and shareholder-friendly policies.” 

**June 25, 2024** [Small-Cap Special Equity Strategy Podcast](Small-Cap Special Equity Strategy Podcast) _Royce & Associates_ “...the market is increasingly focused on this [magnetic sensor] niche with some of the inherent benefits of the technology that are applicable in EVs and industrial automation.” 

**June 4, 2024** [ EP’s NVE Corp. receives $400,000 in state funding](https://www.eplocalnews.org/2024/06/04/eps-nve-corp-receives-400000-in-state-funding/) _Eden Prairie Local News_ “The Minnesota Investment Fund (MIF) awards provide financing to help add new workers and retain high-quality jobs, with a focus on industrial, manufacturing and technology-related industries.” 

**May 29, 2024** [DEED Announces $3.9 Million for Business Expansion](https://content.govdelivery.com/accounts/MNDEED/bulletins/39f6a1a) _Minnesota Department of Employment and Economic Development (DEED)_ “The MIF funding will be used to buy new equipment that will provide smaller, lower power, more precise Wafer Level Chip Scale Package magnetic sensors, enhance domestic sensor manufacturing and strengthen magnetic sensor technology.” 

**May 29, 2024** [Zacks Initiates Coverage of NVE](https://www.zacks.com/stock/news/2280418/zacks-initiates-coverage-of-nve-corp-with-neutral-recommendation) _Zacks Equity Research_ “NVE Corp faces a challenging yet promising landscape, marked by significant developments in its financial performance, strategic investments and market positioning.” 

**February 28, 2024** [NVE Nurtures Growth and Provides Investors with Value](https://www.benzinga.com/insights/dividends/24/02/37365780/nve-nurtures-growth-and-provides-investors-with-value) _Benzinga_ “...the consistent growth in earnings per share for NVE indicates a sound financial status.” 

**February 18, 2024** [Should you be adding NVE to your watchlist today?](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adding-nve-nasdaq-nvec-watchlist-131422112.html) _Simply Wall Street_ “For growth investors, NVE’s raw rate of earnings growth is a beacon in the night. The fast growth bodes well while the very reasonable CEO pay assists builds some confidence in the board.” 

**February 8, 2024** [Chuck Royce Increases Stake in NVE Corp](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/chuck-royce-increases-stake-nve-081025662.html) _Guru Focus_ “Chuck Royce’s approach is encapsulated in the search for companies that exhibit a strong balance sheet, a successful business track record, and the potential for a profitable future.” 

**January 19, 2024** [NVE Corporation: Needs To Increase Sales And Production Capacity In 2024](https://seekingalpha.com/article/4663874-nve-corporation-needs-to-increase-sales-and-production-capacity-in-2024) [registration required] _Seeking Alpha_ “...NVE Corporation achieved high marginal growth in Q3 2024 with net margins increasing to 62% and almost zero debt.” 

**January 18, 2024** [Calculating the Intrinsic Value of NVE Corporation](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/calculating-intrinsic-value-nve-corporation-124308559.html) _Guru Focus_ “NVE’s estimated fair value is $87.11...”
